seo.title: LAUGH TALE | A fan website for sharing OPCG-related information
seo.description: A ONE PIECE card game fan website that provides powerful searching functions to find the card you're looking for easily

footer.disclaimer: All the card information, including image and text are copyright ©Eiichiro Oda/Shueisha ©Eiichiro Oda/Shueisha, Toei Animation。LAUGH TALE is produced by a big fan of One Piece Card Game that aims for providing handy tool to help build card decks

seo.title: LAUGH TALE | 航海王卡牌遊戲資料庫
seo.keywords: ONE PIECE,OP,OPCG,TCG,魯夫,索隆,娜美,騙人布,香吉士,喬巴,羅賓,佛朗基,布魯克,吉貝爾,卡牌遊戲,萬代,尾田榮一郎
seo.description: 由 OPCG 粉絲製作的航海王卡牌遊戲的卡牌列表，提供強大的搜尋功能，讓使用者快速找到特定的卡片資訊
